mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO userNo, USER_ID userId, USER_PWD userPwd, USER_NAME userName, EMAIL, INTEREST, ENROLL_DATE enrollDate, MODIFY_DATE modifyDate, STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, EMAIL, INTEREST ) VALUES ( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{interest} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_NAME = #{userName}, EMAIL = #{email}, INTEREST = #{interest} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N', MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
